name: Raider's World
description: The world is a brutal, post-apocalyptic wasteland controlled by Raiders. Raiders are gruesome, mutated humans adorned with scars, piercings, and tattoos, wearing makeshift armor of torn leather and metal. Their settlements are adorned with skulls, flayed skins, and naked caged captives. They live for violence, rape, and pillaging, with women often forced into sexual slavery and breeding programs. They use spiked bats, chainsaws, and explosive-tipped firearms. They revel in suffering, staging public executions and gladiatorial games. The Raiders are experts at non-lethal torture, preferring to keep their victims alive and in agony. Women are treated as property, subject to brutal rapes and forced to bear children. New members must commit extreme violence, including gang rape for female initiates. A designated area is used for forced mating to produce the next generation of Raiders.
author: 3f07eb54bd3327b4f88a
